title: Live on Tape From The 2017 IPCPR in Las Vegas, NV
itunes:title: Live on Tape From The 2017 IPCPR in Las Vegas, NV
description:
David Garofalo and Mr. Jonathan were in Las Vegas this week where they were performing triple duty. They got together and recorded this show live on tape to give us a first hand look at the 2017 IPCPR show from Las Vegas, Nevada.

In the first hour they light up the Spirit of Art from Cuba Rica, and fill us in on what the IPCPR is all about. We hear first hand from a variety of manufacturers and we even have a very special Classic 3-Way involving Nick Perdomo, Christian Eiroa and Rocky Patel.

Mr. Jonathan gets Debonaire, Barry reports from the Asylum we even have some Reclusive Cigar News.

As always most of the cigars we discuss can be found at http://www.2GuysCigas.com/
